name: ErgoMax Pro Chair
description: Premium ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and breathable mesh back. Perfect for long work sessions.
customer_feedback: Best chair I've ever owned. My back pain is gone after switching to this.

name: ComfortBasic Office Chair
description: Affordable office chair with padded seat and basic lumbar support. Great value for home offices on a budget.
customer_feedback: Solid chair for the price. Nothing fancy but gets the job done.

name: Executive Leather Throne
description: Luxurious leather executive chair with high back, memory foam cushioning, and chrome base. Makes a statement in any office.
customer_feedback: Feels like sitting on a cloud. Worth every penny for the comfort and style.

name: ProGamer X1 Chair
description: Racing-style gaming chair with headrest pillow, lumbar cushion, and reclining backrest. Built for marathon gaming sessions.
customer_feedback: Super comfortable for long gaming sessions. The lumbar pillow is a game changer.

name: Standing Desk Stool
description: Active sitting stool for standing desks. Promotes movement and core engagement while working. Height adjustable.
customer_feedback: Great for alternating between sitting and standing. Helps me stay active during work.

name: AeroMesh Task Chair
description: Full mesh office chair with excellent airflow. Lightweight yet sturdy with smooth-rolling casters.
customer_feedback: Stays cool even in summer. The mesh is surprisingly supportive.
